name: Get public timeline
description:
This is a simple preset that serves as a starting point to dive into the mastodon fediverse.

For retrieving data from Mastodon, you first have to decide for an instance such as sciences.social or mastodon.social. Adjust the base path accordingly.

To get the public timeline, add "public" as a seed not and fetch the data. Each response should give you up to 10 posts. You can get more posts by increasing the maximum pages (requires Facepager 4.6 which will be published soon).

For further information, see https://docs.joinmastodon.org/client/public/
